meanings.definition: In good health; free from disease or illness.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables helps you stay the healthiest.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the healthiest options on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The healthiest cat in the neighborhood loves to chase butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The healthiest tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: Running in the fresh air makes you feel the healthiest you've ever been.

meanings.definition: Promoting good health; beneficial to one's well-being.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise is one of the healthiest habits you can have.
meanings.sent2: The healthiest choice for a snack is a handful of nuts.
meanings.sent3: The healthiest joke of the day made everyone laugh heartily.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the healthiest thing in the room, spreading joy to all.
meanings.sent5: The healthiest environment for growth is one filled with positivity and support.
